Name: Estate Wall Corner: Old City Palisade
Desc: The wall corner of the Refined Estate, built in a style commonly seen in Inazuma.\nThey say that in the early days, there were some areas that were distinctly walled off, but as the city area expanded, the lines of public spaces would be redrawn and these walls were dismantled.\nThe common people say that this has also decreased the likelihood that you will bump into a young lady hurrying along as you turn a blind corner...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
